com.cardconnect.consumersdk.network

Class CCConsumerApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cardconnect.consumersdk.network.CCConsumerApi

  • public abstract class CCConsumerApi
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes Consumer Sdk API services provided.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CCConsumerApi() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void generateAccountForCard(CCConsumerCardInfo consumerCard, CCConsumerTokenCallback tokenCallback)
      Used to generate a token for a card number.
      abstract void generateTokenFromAndroidPayload(CCConsumerAndroidPayGetTokenRequest request, CCConsumerApiCallbacks callbacks)
      Retrieves Cardconnect payment token based on encrypted payload returned by Android Pay in the full wallet request.
      abstract void getPublicKey(CCConsumerApiCallbacks callbacks)
      Gets public key for Merchant in order to be able to request a network token from Android Pay.
      abstract java.lang.String getVersion()
      Returns Api version.
      abstract void setDebugEnabled(boolean debugEnabled)
      Sets debug logging enable or disable.

      Sets EndPoint url for token generation provided by card connect.

        public CCConsumerApi()

    • Method Detail

      • generateAccountForCard

        public abstract void generateAccountForCard(CCConsumerCardInfo consumerCard,
                                            @NonNull
                                            CCConsumerTokenCallback tokenCallback)
        Used to generate a token for a card number.
        Parameters:
        consumerCard - CCConsumerCardInfo The card object to generate a token for. Should not be null.
        tokenCallback - CCConsumerTokenCallback callback event handler for token response.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if consumerCard parameter is null.

      • getVersion

        @NonNull
public abstract java.lang.String getVersion()
        Returns Api version.

      • setEndPoint

        public abstract void setEndPoint(@NonNull
                                 java.lang.String urlEndPoint)
        Sets EndPoint url for token generation provided by card connect. This url must be provided before calling generateAccountForCard(CCConsumerCardInfo, CCConsumerTokenCallback)

      • getPublicKey

        public abstract void getPublicKey(@NonNull
                                  CCConsumerApiCallbacks callbacks)
        Gets public key for Merchant in order to be able to request a network token from Android Pay.

        Check: Request a network token

        Only supported for Consumer facing applications, throws IllegalStateException if it's used on merchant facing scenario.
        Parameters:
        callbacks - CCConsumerApiCallbacks event handler for getting results.
        See Also:
        CCConsumerApiCallbacks, CCConsumerApiPublicKeyResponse

      • generateTokenFromAndroidPayload

        public abstract void generateTokenFromAndroidPayload(@NonNull
                                                     CCConsumerAndroidPayGetTokenRequest request,
                                                     @NonNull
                                                     CCConsumerApiCallbacks callbacks)
        Retrieves Cardconnect payment token based on encrypted payload returned by Android Pay in the full wallet request.

        Check Retrieving encrypted payload for more info.

        Only supported for Consumer facing applications, throws IllegalStateException if it's used on merchant facing scenario.
        Parameters:
        request - CCConsumerAndroidPayGetTokenRequest object containing Android Pay encrypted payload information.
        callbacks - event handler for getting results.
        See Also:
        CCConsumerApiCallbacks, CCConsumerApiAndroidPayTokenResponse

      • setDebugEnabled

        public abstract void setDebugEnabled(boolean debugEnabled)
        Sets debug logging enable or disable.
